completeness_of_answer.description: The extent to which the question has been answered in its entirety

accuracy_of_information.description: The correctness of information provided in response to the question

efficiency_of_solution.description: How effectively the agent navigated the steps needed to reach the answer

resource_utilization.description: How well the agent used available resources to obtain the answer

adherence_to_instructions.description: The ability of the agent to follow the instructions provided during the task

reasoning_traceability.description: The clarity of the agent's reasoning trace left for users to follow

communication_clarity.description: How clear and understandable the agent's communications are

task_completion_time.description: The duration it takes for the agent to complete the task

scalability.description: The agent's capability to handle increasingly complex tasks
